titles.title: Patient Fairness and Indigent Care Promotion Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve the ability of medical professionals to practice medicine and provide quality care to patients by providing a tax deduction for patient bad debt.
Patient Fairness and Indigent Care Promotion Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Patient Fairness and Indigent Care Promotion Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain medical care providers a tax deduction for uncompensated medical care provided to individuals with income below 135% of the poverty line.
